Files Headings

auto-render.coffee
¶ 
define [
  'oraculum'
], (Oraculum) ->
  'use strict'
¶

This mixin should always come last if any other mixins in the depedency chain somehow depend on render being invoked after they've initialized

 

  Oraculum.defineMixin 'AutoRender.ViewMixin',
    mixinOptions:
      autoRender: true

    mixconfig: (mixinOptions, {autoRender} = {}) ->
      mixinOptions.autoRender = autoRender if autoRender?

    mixinitialize: ->
      @render() if @mixinOptions.autoRender is true
